source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Row-rooth has something to ask you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Row-rooth has something to ask you.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_000<tab>I have a question─one that can only be answered by a being of flesh and bone. Will you hear it?
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_000<tab>I have a question─one that can only be answered by a being of flesh and bone. Will you hear it?

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_001<tab>Thank you. Before I ask, however, I require that you learn more of my kind, lest your answer be senseless and vapid.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_001<tab>Thank you. Before I ask, however, I require that you learn more of my kind, lest your answer be senseless and vapid.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_002<tab>You can come to know us through our final words─though, alas, you cannot comprehend them in your corporeal form.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_002<tab>You can come to know us through our final words─though, alas, you cannot comprehend them in your corporeal form.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_003<tab>Thus, I shall temporarily free you from your body, allowing you to perceive as we Ea do. Please indicate when you are ready to shuffle off your mortal coil.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_003<tab>Thus, I shall temporarily free you from your body, allowing you to perceive as we Ea do. Please indicate when you are ready to shuffle off your mortal coil.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_010<tab>You have prepared, yes? Very well. After you have been liberated, I ask that you read three epitaphs ere returning to me.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_010<tab>You have prepared, yes? Very well. After you have been liberated, I ask that you read three epitaphs ere returning to me.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_011<tab>Please brace yourself, as there is the recorded evidence that this may “feel weird”...
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_011<tab>Please brace yourself, as there is the recorded evidence that this may “feel weird”...

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>In order to progress, you must complete the objectives while transfigured.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>In order to progress, you must complete the objectives while transfigured.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_200_011<tab>You will return from your transfigured status if you move too far away. Look to your map for the transfiguration's area of effect.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_200_011<tab>You will return from your transfigured status if you move too far away. Look to your map for the transfiguration's area of effect.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_300_011<tab>If necessary, speak with Row-rooth to restore the transfiguration.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_300_011<tab>If necessary, speak with Row-rooth to restore the transfiguration.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_012<tab>I ask that you read three epitaphs, then return to me.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_012<tab>I ask that you read three epitaphs, then return to me.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_013<tab>Tragically, your spirit has re-entered your body. Permit me to free you once more.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_013<tab>Tragically, your spirit has re-entered your body. Permit me to free you once more.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Something is written here in an unfamiliar script. You cannot read it as you are.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Something is written here in an unfamiliar script. You cannot read it as you are.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to progress, you must be under the transfigured status.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to progress, you must be under the transfigured status.

source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_030(-Epitaph-)I grasp eternity, yet I hold only loss.
If forever has an end,
Why has it not come?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_030(-Epitaph-)I grasp eternity, yet I hold only loss.
If forever has an end,
Why has it not come?

source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTB04343_000_040(-Epitaph-)We fought to go beyond our star;
We fought to go beyond our dimension;
We fought for nothing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTB04343_000_040(-Epitaph-)We fought to go beyond our star;
We fought to go beyond our dimension;
We fought for nothing.

source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTB04343_000_050(-Epitaph-)With no future, we turn to the past,
Knowing none have turned to our present.
We are the dead end.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTB04343_000_050(-Epitaph-)With no future, we turn to the past,
Knowing none have turned to our present.
We are the dead end.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_060<tab>You have read them? This is well. However, you have yet to look upon our most important text. Please seek it in the charming wooded area outside our home.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_060<tab>You have read them? This is well. However, you have yet to look upon our most important text. Please seek it in the charming wooded area outside our home.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_061<tab>Please seek our most important text amidst the memory of trees. I do not know how to make this any clearer.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_061<tab>Please seek our most important text amidst the memory of trees. I do not know how to make this any clearer.

source:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_070(-Epitaph-)The price of eternity is joy;
Its gift, unending sorrow.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_MONUMENTA04343_000_070(-Epitaph-)The price of eternity is joy;
Its gift, unending sorrow.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_081<tab>So you have read all that was left behind...
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_081<tab>So you have read all that was left behind...

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_082<tab>Those inscriptions were written by the first of our kind. The first to know the pinnacle of enlightenment, and the first to know the depths of despair.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_082<tab>Those inscriptions were written by the first of our kind. The first to know the pinnacle of enlightenment, and the first to know the depths of despair.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_083<tab>They have prepared you to answer my question. As someone bound to a corporeal form, do you think there is hope to be found in life?
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_083<tab>They have prepared you to answer my question. As someone bound to a corporeal form, do you think there is hope to be found in life?

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_A1_000_002<tab>The only way to know is to keep living.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_A1_000_002<tab>The only way to know is to keep living.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_090<tab>Strange... But perhaps it is precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_090<tab>Strange... But perhaps it is precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_090<tab>Fascinating... It must be precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_090<tab>Fascinating... It must be precisely that spongy form which allows you to cling to the intangible unto death. How fortunate for you.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_100<tab>Fascinating... It appears that embarking on that quest for hope and seeing it to its ultimate conclusion is a sort of corporeal privilege.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_100<tab>Fascinating... It appears that embarking on that quest for hope and seeing it to its ultimate conclusion is a sort of corporeal privilege.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_100<tab>Fascinating... Though your flesh is spongy and weak, it gives you the strength to live in pursuit of hope.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_100<tab>Fascinating... Though your flesh is spongy and weak, it gives you the strength to live in pursuit of hope.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_110<tab>That was most edifying. Creatures of flesh enjoy shiny tokens, do they not? Please have some as thanks.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_000_110<tab>That was most edifying. Creatures of flesh enjoy shiny tokens, do they not? Please have some as thanks.

source: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_110<tab>...Ah, yes. I shall return you to your body, as it seems you are fond of it.
target: TEXT_AKTKZJ007_04343_ROWROOTH_100_110<tab>...Ah, yes. I shall return you to your body, as it seems you are fond of it.
